summary: A request from my friend. Simply remove the "Raise Zombie" spell from Serana.
descriptionHtml:
*****I'm gathering talents to make a massive New Lands/Quests mod called DOMINION, which is about the war between Skyrim and the Aldmeri Dominion, and the dark sides of humanity.
Details are in here: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1279053-the-elder-scrolls-v-dominion-recruiting-talents/
Urgently urgently SUPER URGENTLY need Trailer Maker, Voice Actresses, CK Workers, Scripters and 3D Modellers!!!*****


Requirements:
Skyrim
Dawnguard


* No Serana, vampire, or cheese were injured during the creation of this mod.

Sometimes Serana's zombies break the Dragonborn's great plan of assassination, which upsets my friend. I hope this mod can save him from downloading an "Unessential Serana" mod. Yeah I know Serana is a necromancer in the lore, but some players (not including me) do not want her to be a uncooperative necromancer.

Okay, I know console commands can solve all sorts of problems, so this is for the console-commands-haters and those who think it's annoying, time consuming and pain causing to type prid 02002b74 then removespell 020011f35 every time you create a new character.

Those lore-friendly and immersion guys, please read paragraph 1 of the description.


Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim
Bethesda for Dawnguard
Bethesda for Serana
Bethesda for Volkihar
Bethesda for Auriel's Bow
Bethesda for Dobahkiin
Bethesda for Vampire
Bethesda for Greybeards
Bethesda for Blades
Bethesda for Alduin
Bethesda for Sea of Ghosts
Bethesda for Thalmor Embassy
Bethesda for Altmer
Bethesda for White Gold Concordat


*****I'm gathering talents to make a massive New Lands/Quests mod called DOMINION, which is about the war between Skyrim and the Aldmeri Dominion, and the dark sides of humanity.
Details are in here: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1279053-the-elder-scrolls-v-dominion-recruiting-talents/
Urgently urgently SUPER URGENTLY need Trailer Maker, Voice Actresses, CK Workers, Scripters and 3D Modellers!!!*****
author: Anbeegod
